title: Lovely Single story, 3 bedroom home with Beautiful Tile Floor
posting_body: Lovely Single story, 3 bedroom 2 bath home with Beautiful New Tile Floor and New Paint  throughout!
This property offers an open living concept, Lots of natural lighting, Kitchen with plenty of cabinet and counter space, Spacious bedrooms,  Cute backyard!
This property won't last long apply now!
Rent only $1550/month with one month's deposit
